title: Syria Live Updates: Israel Says Its Troops Will Stay in Seized Territory for Now
content: The Israeli prime minister said its forces would remain in Syrian territory until “a new force” filled the vacuum. Secretary of State Antony J. Blinken was in Jordan for talks on the aftermath of the Syrian regime’s fall.
